evidence.claim: Merit utilizes AWS for cloud services to support their infrastructure and data processing needs.
The company mentions HIPAA compliance in relation to secure handling of health-related data.
Their API documentation indicates support for RESTful integration, which is a common pattern in health tech applications.
MeritPages likely uses PostgreSQL as a data platform based on discussions of data storage in their developer documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engagement with X12 or clearinghouse use cases.
